extension.description: RandomTV plays random TV episodes. There are a few options: Include unwatched episodes (only watched will be included by default), Update Play Count, Include All TV Shows or Select TV Shows
extension.disclaimer: My First Add-On. Please by gentle
extension.news: v0.1 (25 March 2017) - Initial Build (Alpha) v0.2 (26 March 2017) - Bummed Code - Changed Logic - Set Repeat Mode back to what it was before addon changed it to all v0.2.1 (29 March 2017) - Fixed condition where "Include All TV Shows"=true and "Include Unwatched"=false would result in Unwatched Episodes being included
